name: orangeness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being orange: I was struck by the orangeness of his orange jumpsuit. The degree of redness or orangeness of the sunset depends on how clear the atmosphere is. See
orange
More examplesFewer examplesI saw a shape, rather like a crescent, with an orangeness to it.My eyes were drawn to the orangeness of her skin.We see examples of orangeness every day, such as carrots, traffic cones, and pumpkins.
